api_port.name: API Port
api_port.description: Port for external API access (used by Home Assistant sensors and REST commands)

database_type.name: Database Type
database_type.description: Choose 'sqlite' for embedded database (no dependencies) or 'postgres' for external PostgreSQL server

postgres_host.name: PostgreSQL Host
postgres_host.description: Hostname or IP address of PostgreSQL server (only when using postgres type)

redis_url.name: Redis URL (Optional)
redis_url.description: Redis connection string for Celery task queue. Leave empty to disable background tasks

symbols.name: Trading Pairs
symbols.description: List of trading pair symbols to track (e.g., BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT). API keys can be stored in secrets.yaml

fetch_interval_minutes.name: Fetch Interval (minutes)
fetch_interval_minutes.description: How often to fetch new candlestick data from exchanges

analysis_enabled.name: Enable Analysis
analysis_enabled.description: Enable market analysis (Fear & Greed, derivatives, scoring)

analysis_interval_hours.name: Analysis Interval (hours)
analysis_interval_hours.description: How often to run market analysis (1-24 hours)

alert_on_strong_signals.name: Alert on Strong Signals
alert_on_strong_signals.description: Send notifications when strong buy/sell signals are detected

alert_threshold_buy.name: Buy Alert Threshold
alert_threshold_buy.description: Score threshold for strong buy alerts (50-100)

alert_threshold_sell.name: Sell Alert Threshold
alert_threshold_sell.description: Score threshold for strong sell alerts (0-50)
